widget.name: Help Text Viewer
widget.description: Displays a help text. Might be toggled by the Help Text Trigger

property.caption: Help text
property.description: The help text which will be displayed when the user clicks or hovers the Help Text Viewer

property.caption: Always Visible
property.description: If true, the button will be always visible, if false, the button will only be visible when Help Texts are triggered.

property.caption: Show on hover
property.description: Show the help text when the mouse hovers over the button

property.caption: Close on click
property.description: Closes the button when clicking anywhere on the page

property.caption: Width
property.description: Width of the help box in pixels

property.caption: Height
property.description: Maximum height of the help box in pixels

property.caption: Positioning
property.description:
As popup - Item is rendered on top of all content (left / right is determined automatically) Left aligned - Item is rendered on the left of the help button Right aligned - Item is rendered on the right of the help button
Use left or right when the helptext should be hidden if the button is hidden (For example when using in combination with tab control). Use popup if the helptext should be visible outside the current form. See the screenshots for examples.
